00148 bool ModelViewer::onUnload() {
00149 
00150     ThreeDRenderLayer* Layer = (ThreeDRenderLayer*) GRenderer::getRenderer()->getLayer(Layer_3D);
00151 
00152 /*    Layer->RemoveNode(Test);
00153     Layer->RemoveNode(TestTerrain);

00157     delete m_worldNode;
00158

00160     m_gameEngine->getEventManager()->unregisterEventCallback(EVENT_MOVE_FORWARD, ForwardHandle);
00161     m_gameEngine->getEventManager()->unregisterEventCallback(EVENT_MOVE_FORWARD_STOP, ForwardReleaseHandle);
00162

00171

00232 void ModelViewer::updateApplication(float seconds) {
00233 
00234     //  TestTerrain->m_rotation.y += 60 * seconds;
00235     ThreeDRenderLayer* Layer = (ThreeDRenderLayer*) GRenderer::getRenderer()->getLayer(Layer_3D);
00236     //Layer->getActiveCamera()->rotate(0, 10*seconds, 0);
00237 
00238     if (m_Left == true) {
00239         Layer->getActiveCamera()->rotate(0, -viewerRotateSpeed * seconds, 0);
00240     }
00241 
00242     if (m_Right == true) {
00243         Layer->getActiveCamera()->rotate(0, viewerRotateSpeed * seconds, 0);
00244     }
00245 
00246     if (m_Up == true) {
00247         Layer->getActiveCamera()->rotate(viewerRotateSpeed * seconds, 0, 0);
00248     }
00249 
00250     if (m_Down == true) {
00251         Layer->getActiveCamera()->rotate(-viewerRotateSpeed * seconds, 0, 0);
00252     }
00253 
00254     if (m_Forward == true) {
00255 
00256         /*
00257         float Value = viewerMoveSpeed;
00258         Value = Value * cos(Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180);
00259 
00260         float Value2 = viewerMoveSpeed;
00261         Value2 = Value2 * sin(Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180);
00262 
00263         float Value3 = viewerMoveSpeed;
00264         Value3 = Value3 * sin(Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180);
00265 
00266         Layer->getActiveCamera()->move(-Value2 * seconds, Value3 * seconds, Value * seconds);
00267         */
00268 
00269         float xIncrement = viewerMoveSpeed * sin (Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180) * seconds;
00270         float yIncrement = viewerMoveSpeed * sin (Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getX() * M_PI / 180) * seconds;
00271         float zIncrement = viewerMoveSpeed * cos (Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180) * seconds;
00272 
00273         Layer->getActiveCamera()->move(-xIncrement, yIncrement, zIncrement);
00274 
00275 
00276     }
00277 
00278     if (m_Backward == true) {
00279 
00280         /*
00281         float Value = viewerMoveSpeed;
00282         Value = Value * cos(Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180);
00283 
00284         float Value2 = viewerMoveSpeed;
00285         Value2 = Value2 * sin(Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180);
00286 
00287         float Value3 = viewerMoveSpeed;
00288         Value3 = Value3 * sin(Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180);
00289 
00290         Layer->getActiveCamera()->move(Value2 * seconds, -Value3 * seconds, -Value * seconds);
00291         */
00292 
00293 
00294         float xIncrement = viewerMoveSpeed * sin (Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180) * seconds;
00295         float yIncrement = viewerMoveSpeed * sin (Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getX() * M_PI / 180) * seconds;
00296         float zIncrement = viewerMoveSpeed * cos (Layer->getActiveCamera()->getRotation().getY() * M_PI / 180) * seconds;
00297 
00298         Layer->getActiveCamera()->move(xIncrement, -yIncrement, -zIncrement);
00299 
00300 
00301     }
00302 }
